name: NFL Quarterback Club 2000
overview: Iguana Entertainment, the developer of NFL QUARTERBACK CLUB ’99, is at it again with NFL QUARTERBACK CLUB 2000 for the Dreamcast. Experience realism like you’ve never seen, with all-new player models and animations that’ll make you swear you’re watching a game on TV. Take your pick from all 31 NFL teams, including the expansion Cleveland Browns, and see if you can lead your team to the Super Bowl. With NFL QUARTERBACK CLUB 2000, you’ll get everything you’ve ever wanted in a football game and more.
